intro: Stackhousia annua, commonly known as the annual stackhousia, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Acanthaceae family and is characterized by its erect, branching stems and opposite leaves. The plant produces showy, tubular flowers that are typically pink or purple in color. It thrives in well-drained soils and is often found in grassland habitats. Stackhousia annua is an annual herb, meaning it completes its life cycle within a single growing season.
